name: VentricularAssistDevicePlacement
title: Ventricular Assist Device placement
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent procedures used to identify the placement of a ventricular assist device.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Procedure, Performed. The intent of this data element is to identify procedures for ventricular assist device placement. ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with identifying patients with ventricular assist device placement. This is a grouping of ICD-10-PCS and SNOMED CT codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
